settings.title: About the shop
settings.text: Use this text area to tell your customers about your brand and vision. You can change it in the theme settings.

settings.heading: Email us
settings.subheading: Send us an email through the form. We usually respond within one business day.

settings.title: Finest Moroccan Rugs
settings.subheading: Authentic Moroccan rugs made and managed by Berber weavers.

settings.title: Founded by Berber Moroccan artist
settings.subheading:
Rugs have been made in my family for generations. 
I've combined my art formal education abroad & my passion for humanity to create the finest Moroccan rugs, that directly benefit  weavers in my Atlas community of Morocco.

settings.title: Welcome to the source of the finest Moroccan rugs
settings.text: We pride ourselves as an authentic fair-trade project founded and managed by Berber weaving ladies and families. We make the finest Berber Rugs, and only use high quality handspun wool. We excel at custom rugs, nursery rugs and for any other space. We also offer a carefully curated selection of vintage moroccan rugs sold on behalf of previous owners in our Berber community.

settings.heading: Custom Rugs by Zayania
settings.subheading:
Let Zayania create your unique Moroccan rug, that you'll cherish a lifetime. You can specify your prefered colors for multiple drafts by the rug artist. Our custom orders don't cost more, in fact they cost less as they are already made to be immediately sold and not to be listed awaiting sale.
Get in touch via instagram & send a Direct Message, for a prompt response to get started on your lifetime rug.

settings.heading: High quality handspun wool
settings.subheading: We make our rugs the traditional way our grandmothers taught us. We wash the natural wool, handspin it for a fine lifetime rug.
settings.link_text: Click for our Betseller Stunning Rug

settings.heading: Zayania Heritage
settings.subheading: This project is dedicated to the souls of my grandmothers Safia and Aicha, who passed on the weaving heritage and kindness to me.

settings.quote: This rug is the most beautiful piece of art I have ever owned!! I am so in love with all of the pieces in this shop and the fact that they are designed and made with such love and care makes purchasing one such a wonderful experience. I will definitely be purchasing from this shop again one day! (Also it shipped from Morocco to California at lightning speed)
settings.author: Annie and Erin

settings.quote: Bought this gorgeous rug from Morocco from @ZayaniaRugs for the bb's room. Thank you so much for this work of art.
settings.author: Brittany Morgan

settings.quote: Beautiful rug, my cat is crazy over it too!
settings.author: Xueling

settings.quote: Beautiful, wonderful, amazing, fantastic, incredible, the best rug I have ever bought, so worth the money, a kind seller , with great communication, sent it quickly, all good, canâ€™t reccomend or Thankyou enough
settings.author: Dilly Dinosaur

settings.quote: I absolutely LOVE my new rug. It came to me so quickly and is very soft and more beautiful in person!
settings.author: Lisa Larkin

settings.quote: Wonderful rug. Clean and exactly as described.
settings.author: Brannon B

settings.title: Made and managed by Berber weavers and families
settings.subheading: Fatima, 16 year old studious high schooler is helping  finish on time, as the official weaver for this rug is indisposed. I am taking a video, while our little Bushra is playing supervisor:)

settings.title: Fun Boucherouite Rugs
settings.collection_subheading: A bold and colorful touch to any space. Boucherouite, The perfect  indoors and outdoors rug!

settings.title: Ultimate Selection of Unique Vintage Berber rugs
settings.subheading: If you are looking for a unique authentic vintage Berber rare rug, you've come to the right place. Our carefully curated selection of vintage Moroccan rugs will make you gasp!

settings.heading: Our wedding blankets
settings.subheading:
or bride's blanket, is what Middle Atlas berbers (Zayane) gift to a bride. My mom still treasures hers since the late seventies.
Let us make you a unique custom size/color wedding blanket.

settings.heading: Something unique
Shine bright like a Zayania Wedding blanket
settings.link_text: Don't forget to add a link or two

settings.heading: We are happy you found us
settings.subheading: Founded by Moroccan Berber humanist Artist, Zayania, living among the mountains community, our fair-trade rugs equal happy weavers that make a lasting fine rug for you.
settings.link_text: Don't forget to add a link or two

settings.title: Exclusive discounts and promos:
settings.subheading: We are generous and grateful, and we would love to message you about future offers, discounts, and our mountain weaving lives. We won't flood you, perhaps once every two weeks and on special holidays  only! :)

settings.title: Zayania Heritage
settings.subheading: I was fortunate to love the English language and excel at it, and to have studied and lived in North America. Back to Morocco, I decided to help my people and their children have a comfortable life, to follow through education and carry on the heritage and sustain. ZAYANIA

settings.title: Newsletters can reinforce your brand
settings.subheading: Include a short sentence describing what someone can expect from your newsletter.

settings.title: 5x8 Rugs by Zayania Assya
settings.collection_subheading: unique fine moroccan rugs designed by Zayania Assya.
